description: 'Dinamo Zagreb confident of signing Celtic's Greg Taylor' - gossip
title: 'Dinamo Zagreb confident of signing Celtic's Greg Taylor'
title_page: 'Dinamo Zagreb confident of signing Celtic's Greg Taylor' - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Dinamo Zagreb remain confident of landing Greg Taylor at the end of his Celtic contract this summer after offering the 27-year-old a significant increase on his current deal, but the Scotland left-back also has options in Major League Soccer and they have not been dismissed yet for family reasons. (Daily Record), external
Everton could land 19-year-old Scotland winger Ben Doak if they offer a fee of Â£30m this summer to city rivals Liverpool. (Football Insider), external
Millwall had a representative watching Kevin Nisbet continue his impressive goalscoring heroics on loan to Aberdeen last weekend amid speculation around the in-form Scotland striker's future with the London club. (The Herald), external
